meanings.definition: Remove dead, damaged, or infected tissue from a wound.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will debride the wound to help it heal faster.
meanings.sent2: It is important to debride the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent3: The nurse joked that debriding the wound was like cleaning out a messy drawer.
meanings.sent4: Debriding the wound is like pruning a plant to promote new growth.
meanings.sent5: With skilled hands, the surgeon debrided the wound, revealing healthy tissue underneath.
